HomePage.title: Study smarter, faster, and hassle-free.
HomePage.subtitle: Upload your exams or tests in PDF format and instantly turn them into interactive quizzes.
HomePage.description: Get immediate corrections when available or smart answer suggestions when not. It's the fastest and easiest way to review, spot mistakes, and get ready to ace your tests.
HomePage.dropzoneText: *Drag and drop or use the button "Process PDF". Only one PDF file is allowed at a time.
